website_summaries.verdict: It’s a nice change of pace to see a wilderness-themed Batman and his pal Swamp Thing, and these creatively designed little figures will keep little fans occupied for hours.
pros: Includes Batman and Swamp Thing figures
Machete and backpack are easy to place on Tactical Batman
Best for very young DC Comics fans

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy and awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have autism and like a 8 year old i like my imaginext toy batman and swamp thing I like the green on the swamp thing I like how the batman back pack come off batman easy I like the color of Batman
customer_reviews.author: drew darling

customer_reviews.title: Love me some swamp thing
customer_reviews.text: Great combo! My kiddo loves having yet another Batman but I’m thankful it is a different sculpt and that the accessories make him an adventurer. I’m happy that my kid is learning about swamp thing. Both are sturdy figures!
customer_reviews.author: Clark Family

customer_reviews.title: Swamp Thing, Great Detail
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Great detail on Swamp Thing, probably the best I’ve seen on any swamp thing toy or figure..
customer_reviews.author: Zach F.

customer_reviews.title: Great plan!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great plan, I can't wait for warmer weather to go out in the garage and start building.

customer_reviews.title: Good value. kid's love em
customer_reviews.text: Once again my kids love these imaginex toys. Good value and my kids always love these.

customer_reviews.title: Imaginext is Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift. Imaginext is a great product. Excellent quality. Very detailed. We have played with them for years and our collection continues to grow.

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Imaginext DC Super Friends, Batman & Swamp Thing
product_meta.description:
The citizens and environment of Gotham City are in danger! Batman needs some help with this unusual ecological foe, so he reaches out to Swamp Thing , controller of all plant life on earth, for help. Can these fearless defenders protect the city? That's for your young Super Hero to decide! Fisher-Price Imaginext Imagine What's Next!

BRAND STORY
Imagine… a world where kids bring fantastical adventures to life as they play! Imaginext playsets and figures—designed by Fisher-Price—plus your child’s growing imagination make it happen. Kids are the heroes (and storytellers) as they’re transported to the days of dinosaurs or dragons or the worlds of Batman, Power Rangers or SpongeBob. Whether kids use Imaginext toys and playsets to act out real-life situations or invent whole new worlds, they’re learning about themselves and others and developing thinking and problem-solving skills while they play.
feature_bullets: Batman goes "green" to defend the environment with Swamp Thing!
The battle is on! Move the figures to bring the action to life.
Backpack and weapon accessories snap onto Batman figure
Includes Batman & Swamp Thing figures with tactical suit, backpack & machete accessories
Bring these figures to any Fisher-Price Imaginext DC Super Friends playset to bring the action to life! (Each sold separately and subject to availability.)
